20101221023417.000|20101221023419.000|CC1|RUNWAY CLEARED, A MAJORITY OF   
20101221023419.000|20101221023421.000|CC1|FLIGHTS WERE CANCELED.

20101221023445.000|20101221023447.000|CC1|HALLWAYS IN MAKESHIFT CAMPS,    
20101221023447.000|20101221023450.000|CC1|SLEEPING, EATING, WAITING.

20101221024440.000|20101221024441.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ANOTHER IS THE HERB
20101221024441.000|20101221024443.000|CC1|ECHINACEA.                      
20101221024443.000|20101221024445.000|CC1|THE FIFTH MOST POPULAR HERBAL   
20101221024445.000|20101221024446.000|CC1|SUPPLEMENT, WITH SALES OF $16   
20101221024446.000|20101221024448.000|CC1|MILLION A YEAR.                 
20101221024448.000|20101221024450.000|CC1|NATIVE AMERICANS USED ECHINACEA,
20101221024450.000|20101221024452.000|CC1|AND IT BECAME A POPULAR         
20101221024452.000|20101221024454.000|CC1|HOMEOPATHIC REMEDY.             
20101221024454.000|20101221024457.000|CC1|SMALLER STUDIES OF ITS          
20101221024457.000|20101221024458.000|CC1|EFFECTIVENESS HAVE PRODUCED     
20101221024458.000|20101221024459.000|CC1|CONFLICTING RESULTS.            
20101221024459.000|20101221024501.000|CC1|BUT THE BIGGEST AND BEST STUDY, 
20101221024501.000|20101221024502.000|CC1|FINANCED BY THE FEDERAL         
20101221024502.000|20101221024503.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT, FINDS IT OFFERS     
20101221024503.000|20101221024507.000|CC1|VIRTUALLY NO RELIEF.            
20101221024507.000|20101221024508.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE NO PROVEN          
20101221024508.000|20101221024509.000|CC1|TREATMENTS FOR COMMON COLD IN   
20101221024509.000|20101221024511.000|CC1|TERMS OF REDUCING THE LENGTH OF 
20101221024511.000|20101221024512.000|CC1|THE COLD OR THE OVERALL         
20101221024512.000|20101221024513.000|CC1|SEVERITY.                       
20101221024513.000|20101221024514.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN THE LATEST      
20101221024514.000|20101221024516.000|CC1|STUDY, MORE THAN 700 PEOPLE,    
20101221024516.000|20101221024520.000|CC1|AGED 12 TO 80, GOT THE HERB OR A
20101221024520.000|20101221024521.000|CC1|PLACEBO AT THE FIRST SIGN OF A  
20101221024521.000|20101221024522.000|CC1|COLD.                           
20101221024522.000|20101221024523.000|CC1|CAREFUL EXAMINATION SHOWED NO   
20101221024523.000|20101221024524.000|CC1|CHANGE IN THE INFLAMMATORY      
20101221024524.000|20101221024525.000|CC1|REACTION THAT CAUSES THE CRUMMY 
20101221024525.000|20101221024529.000|CC1|FEELING OF A COLD.              
20101221024529.000|20101221024530.000|CC1|THE COMMON COLD IS NOT JUST     
20101221024530.000|20101221024531.000|CC1|UNPLEASANT, ADULTS GET TWO OR   
20101221024531.000|20101221024532.000|CC1|THREE A YEAR, CHILDREN MANY     
20101221024532.000|20101221024533.000|CC1|MORE.                           
20101221024533.000|20101221024535.000|CC1|IT'S RESPONSIBLE FOR AN         
20101221024535.000|20101221024536.000|CC1|ESTIMATED 20 MILLION TO 30      
20101221024536.000|20101221024538.000|CC1|MILLION LOST DAYS OF WORK AND   
20101221024538.000|20101221024540.000|CC1|SCHOOL EVERY YEAR, WITH AN      
20101221024540.000|20101221024542.000|CC1|ECONOMIC IMPACT OF $40 BILLION. 
20101221024542.000|20101221024545.000|CC1|DECONGESTANTS AND COUGH         
20101221024545.000|20101221024548.000|CC1|MEDICINES RELIEVE SOME SYMPTOMS,
20101221024548.000|20101221024551.000|CC1|BUT NOT THE UNDERLYING INFECTION
20101221024551.000|20101221024553.000|CC1|THAT CAN BE CAUSED BY MORE THAN 
20101221024553.000|20101221024554.000|CC1|200 VIRUSES.                    
20101221024554.000|20101221024556.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH THERE'S BEEN ALMOST NO 
20101221024556.000|20101221024557.000|CC1|PROGRESS TOWARD A CURE, THE     
20101221024557.000|20101221024559.000|CC1|DOCTOR IN CHARGE OF THE         
20101221024559.000|20101221024600.000|CC1|ECHINACEA STUDY BELIEVES THERE  
20101221024600.000|20101221024601.000|CC1|WILL BE.                        
20101221024601.000|20101221024603.000|CC1|>> I CERTAINLY HOPE SO.         
20101221024603.000|20101221024604.000|CC1|I JUST TURNED 50 AND I PLAN TO  
20101221024604.000|20101221024606.000|CC1|RETIRE IN MAYBE 20 TO 30 YEARS  
20101221024606.000|20101221024607.000|CC1|AND BETWEEN NOW AND THEN I WILL 
20101221024607.000|20101221024609.000|CC1|DO MY BEST.

20101221024609.000|20101221024611.000|CC1|NEEDED.

20101221024612.000|20101221024613.000|CC1|REMEDY SHOWN TO BE NO MATCH FOR 
20101221024613.000|20101221024615.000|CC1|THE COMMON COLD.
